verses.verse: Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Sanctify <S%H6942><s%> to me all of the firstborn, <S%H1060><s%> whatever opens <S%H6363><s%> the womb <S%H7358><s%> among the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> both of man <S%H120><s%> and of animal. <S%H929><s%> It is mine."

Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the people, <S%H5971><s%> "Remember <S%H2142><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> in which you came out <S%H3318><s%> from Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> out of the house <S%H1004><s%> of bondage; <S%H5650><s%> for by strength <S%H2392><s%> of hand <S%H3027><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> brought you out <S%H3318><s%> from this place. <S%H2557><s%> No leavened bread shall be eaten. <S%H398><s%>
This day <S%H3117><s%> you go out <S%H3318><s%> in the month <S%H2320><s%> Abib. <S%H24><s%>

It shall be, <S%H3068><s%> when Yahweh shall bring <S%H935><s%> you into the land <S%H776><s%> of the Canaanite, <S%H3669><s%> and the Hittite, <S%H2850><s%> and the Amorite, <S%H567><s%> and the Hivite, <S%H2340><s%> and the Jebusite, <S%H2983><s%> which he swore <S%H7650><s%> to your fathers <S%H1><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> you, <S%H776><s%> a land flowing <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey, <S%H1706><s%> that you shall keep <S%H5647><s%> this service <S%H5656><s%> in this month. <S%H2320><s%>

Seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> you shall eat <S%H398><s%> unleavened bread, <S%H4682><s%> and in the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> shall be a feast <S%H2282><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

Unleavened bread <S%H4682><s%> shall be eaten <S%H398><s%> throughout the seven <S%H7651><s%> days; <S%H3117><s%> and no leavened bread <S%H2557><s%> shall be seen <S%H7200><s%> with you, <S%H7603><s%> neither shall yeast be seen <S%H7200><s%> with you, <S%H1366><s%> in all your borders.

You shall tell <S%H5046><s%> your son <S%H1121><s%> in that day, <S%H3117><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H5668><s%> 'It is because of that <S%H2088><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> for me when I came out <S%H3318><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>'

It shall be for a sign <S%H226><s%> to you on your hand, <S%H3027><s%> and for a memorial <S%H2146><s%> between your eyes, <S%H5869><s%> that the law <S%H8451><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> may be in your mouth; <S%H6310><s%> for with a strong <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has brought you out <S%H3318><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>
You shall therefore keep <S%H8104><s%> this ordinance <S%H2708><s%> in its season <S%H4150><s%> from year <S%H3117><s%> to year. <S%H3117><s%>

"It shall be, <S%H3068><s%> when Yahweh shall bring <S%H935><s%> you into the land <S%H776><s%> of the Canaanite, <S%H3669><s%> as he swore <S%H7650><s%> to you and to your fathers, <S%H1><s%> and shall give it you, <S%H5414><s%>

that you shall set apart <S%H5674><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> all that opens <S%H6363><s%> the womb, <S%H7358><s%> and every firstborn <S%H6363><s%> which you have that comes <S%H7698><s%> from an animal. <S%H929><s%> The males <S%H2145><s%> shall be Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s.

Every firstborn <S%H6363><s%> of a donkey <S%H2543><s%> you shall redeem <S%H6299><s%> with a lamb; <S%H7716><s%> and if you will not redeem <S%H6299><s%> it, <S%H6202><s%> then you shall break its neck; and you shall redeem <S%H6299><s%> all the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> among your sons. <S%H1121><s%>

It shall be, <S%H1121><s%> when your son asks <S%H7592><s%> you in time to come, <S%H4279><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H559><s%> 'What is this?' that you shall tell him, <S%H2392><s%> 'By strength of hand <S%H3027><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> brought us out <S%H3318><s%> from Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> from the house <S%H1004><s%> of bondage; <S%H5650><s%>

and it happened, <S%H6547><s%> when Pharaoh would hardly <S%H7185><s%> let us go, <S%H7971><s%> that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> killed <S%H2026><s%> all the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> both the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> and the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of animal. <S%H929><s%> Therefore I sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> all that opens <S%H6363><s%> the womb, <S%H7358><s%> being males; <S%H2145><s%> but all the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of my sons <S%H1121><s%> I redeem. <S%H6299><s%>'

It shall be for a sign <S%H226><s%> on your hand, <S%H3027><s%> and for symbols <S%H2903><s%> between your eyes: <S%H5869><s%> for by strength <S%H2392><s%> of hand <S%H3027><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> brought us out <S%H3318><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>"

It happened, <S%H6547><s%> when Pharaoh had let the people <S%H5971><s%> go, <S%H7971><s%> that God <S%H7971><s%> didn't <S%H5148><s%> lead them by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of the Philistines, <S%H6430><s%> although <S%H3588><s%> that was near; <S%H7138><s%> for God <S%H430><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Lest perhaps the people <S%H5971><s%> change <S%H5162><s%> their minds when they see <S%H7200><s%> war, <S%H4421><s%> and they return <S%H7725><s%> to Egypt; <S%H4714><s%>"

but God <S%H430><s%> led <S%H5437><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> around <S%H5437><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> by the Red <S%H5488><s%> Sea; <S%H3220><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> armed <S%H2571><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the bones <S%H6106><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> with him, <S%H7650><s%> for he had made the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> swear, <S%H7650><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "God <S%H430><s%> will surely <S%H6485><s%> visit <S%H6485><s%> you, <S%H5927><s%> and you shall carry up my bones <S%H6106><s%> away from here with you. <S%H5927><s%>"
They took their journey <S%H5265><s%> from Succoth, <S%H5523><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Etham, <S%H864><s%> in the edge <S%H7097><s%> of the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them by day <S%H3119><s%> in a pillar <S%H5982><s%> of cloud, <S%H6051><s%> to lead <S%H5148><s%> them on their way, <S%H1870><s%> and by night <S%H3915><s%> in a pillar <S%H5982><s%> of fire, <S%H784><s%> to give them light, <S%H215><s%> that they might go <S%H3212><s%> by day <S%H3119><s%> and by night: <S%H3915><s%>

the pillar <S%H5982><s%> of cloud <S%H6051><s%> by day, <S%H3119><s%> and the pillar <S%H5982><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%> by night, <S%H3915><s%> didn't <S%H4185><s%> depart from before <S%H6440><s%> the people. <S%H5971><s%>
